thread.title: In rare move, U.S. Senate debates fate of 'Dreamers'

title: In rare move, U.S. Senate debates fate of 'Dreamers'
text:
In rare move, U.S. Senate debates fate of 'Dreamers' 6:07am EST - 02:17 
The U.S. Senate began a major, free-for-all immigration debate, its first in nearly five years, on Monday evening that could decide the fate of at least 700,000 “Dreamer” immigrants, young people brought into the country illegally years ago as children. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. Senate began a major, free-for-all immigration debate, its first in nearly five years, on Monday evening that could decide the fate of at least 700,000 “Dreamer” immigrants, young people brought into the country illegally years ago as children.
